body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

RADIUSS Cloud CI is encountering CAMP resource-related failures (building tutorial examples) during the build of umpire@develop%gcc@7.5.0 arch=linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64.  See https://cdash.spack.io/viewBuildError.php?buildid=162995.

```
...
     180    [ 25%] Building CXX object src/umpire/util/CMakeFiles/umpire_util.d
            ir/MPI.cpp.o

            avmuimbinaa6bqljh/spack-build-iqlz5ub/src/umpire/util && /builds/sp
            ack/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++  -I/home/software/radiuss/__spack_p

            _path_placeholder__/__spack_path_placeholder__/__spack_path_placeho

            mp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-umpire-develop-iqlz5ubwevprvwcavmui
            mbinaa6bqljh/spack-build-iqlz5ub/include -Wpedantic       -Wall -We
            xtra  -O2 -g -DNDEBUG -fPIC -std=c++11 -MD -MT src/umpire/util/CMak
            eFiles/umpire_util.dir/MPI.cpp.o -MF CMakeFiles/umpire_util.dir/MPI
            .cpp.o.d -o CMakeFiles/umpire_util.dir/MPI.cpp.o -c /tmp/root/spack

            4/gcc-7.5.0/camp-0.1.0-kblcdklscvi7fnwcght5dhyjq5omzu5v/include/cam
            p/resource.hpp:160:5: note: candidate: constexpr camp::resources::v
            1::EventProxy<Res>::EventProxy(camp::resources::v1::EventProxy<Res>
            &&) [with Res = camp::resources::v1::Resource]
     193         EventProxy(EventProxy &&) = default;
     194         ^~~~~~~~~~
...
```


### Information on your system

Reporting results from Spack Cloud CI so see above snippets for a bit more information, which ran on the `uo-delphi` runner. Hopefully the links will stay around a while.

### Additional information

@davidbeckingsale 

[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6958332/spack-build-out.txt)
[umpire.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6958334/umpire.yaml.txt)

Note: I am selecting check boxes in "General Information" where the roughly equivalent information is (hopefully) provided by alternative file(s)/links.

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and **@mentioned** any maintainers
- [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: umpire@develop build failure (RADIUSS Cloud CI)
